title: Female pilot finishes epic flight in Sydney
description: A British pilot has arrived in Sydney in Australia - more than three months after setting off from Farnborough, Hampshire, in the UK in a vintage bi-plane. Tracey Curtis-Taylor wanted to retrace the journey made by Amy Johnson in 1930. During her epic flight, she made 50 refuelling stops and covered 14,600 miles, flying over 23 countries.
